p: The ammonium-based ionic liquid tri-n-butylmethylammonium chloride, [N 1444]Cl, was selected by Bhujbal et al. [ 62] to study the electrochemical behaviour of uranyl ion, UO 2 2+ ( Figure 14). An irreversible reduction of U(VI) to U(IV) was observed, resulting in the electrodeposition of uranium oxide (UO 2) over the glassy carbon working electrode.
